name: Arif Hasan
bio: Arif is a certified personal trainer with over 8 years of experience in fitness coaching. He specializes in strength training and weight loss programs.

name: Maya Rahman
bio: Maya is a yoga and mindfulness expert who has been teaching for 10 years. She focuses on holistic wellness and stress management through yoga practices.

name: Rakin Ahmed
bio: Rakin is a certified fitness instructor and group trainer. He specializes in high-intensity interval training (HIIT) and functional fitness.
